channel.title: Whonix news cannot be verified
channel.description:
Today the whonixcheck of both my workstation and gateway said it failed to verify whonix news.
Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News !!! (gpg_bash_lib_output_gpg_verify_exit_code: 0 | gpg_bash_lib_output_validsig_status: true | gpg_bash_lib_output_alright_status: false | gpg_bash_lib_output_failure: ) This is either, - a Whonix Bug, - an attack on Whonix, - or Whonix News Keys might be outdated. Upgrading using apt-get might fix this
p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }
INFO: Whonix News gpg_bash_lib_output_diagnostic_message: gpg_bash_lib_internal_gpg_verify_status_fd_file: /tmp/tmp.cpoBAOhTZG/news/verify_dir/news_gpg/gpg_bash_lib_internal_gpg_verify_status_fd_file gpg_bash_lib_internal_gpg_verify_output_file: /tmp/tmp.cpoBAOhTZG/news/verify_dir/news_gpg/gpg_bash_lib_internal_gpg_verify_output_file gpg_bash_lib_output_gpg_import_output: gpg: keyring `/tmp/tmp.cpoBAOhTZG/news/verify_dir/news_gpg/secring.gpg' created gpg: keyring `/tmp/tmp.cpoBAOhTZG/news/verify_dir/news_gpg/pubring.gpg' created gpg: /tmp/tmp.cpoBAOhTZG/news/verify_dir/news_gpg/trustdb.gpg: trustdb created gpg: key 2EEACCDA: public key "Patrick Schleizer " imported gpg: Total number processed: 1 gpg: imported: 1 (RSA: 1) gpg: no ultimately trusted keys found gpg_bash_lib_output_gpg_verify_output: gpg: Signature made Wed 05 Apr 2017 11:26:34 AM UTC using RSA key ID 77BB3C48 gpg: Good signature from "Patrick Schleizer " gpg: Signature notation: issuer-fpr@notations.openpgp.fifthhorseman.net=6E979B28A6F37C43BE30AFA1CB8D50BB77BB3C48 gpg: Signature notation: file@name=whonix_news.tar.xz Primary key fingerprint: 916B 8D99 C38E AF5E 8ADC 7A2A 8D66 066A 2EEA CCDA Subkey fingerprint: 6E97 9B28 A6F3 7C43 BE30 AFA1 CB8D 50BB 77BB 3C48 gpg_bash_lib_output_gpg_verify_status_fd_output: [GNUPG:] SIG_ID nlx+VxjJVde37wJeoRHTjE+he2o 2017-04-05 1491391594 [GNUPG:] GOODSIG CB8D50BB77BB3C48 Patrick Schleizer [GNUPG:] NOTATION_NAME issuer-fpr@notations.openpgp.fifthhorseman.net [GNUPG:] NOTATION_DATA 6E979B28A6F37C43BE30AFA1CB8D50BB77BB3C48 [GNUPG:] NOTATION_NAME file@name [GNUPG:] NOTATION_DATA whonix_news.tar.xz [GNUPG:] VALIDSIG 6E979B28A6F37C43BE30AFA1CB8D50BB77BB3C48 2017-04-05 1491391594 0 4 0 1 10 00 916B8D99C38EAF5E8ADC7A2A8D66066A2EEACCDA [GNUPG:] TRUST_ULTIMATE

item.title: Whonix news cannot be verified
item.dc:creator: Sirial
item.description:
Hi! Try download by this link https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Windows/ I have got the same problem and after reinstalletion it was fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix news cannot be verified

item.description:
So did yo ufind a solution for this problem? It have been iike this for me a couple of days now.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix news cannot be verified
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
mT8RQf:

just don’t call it “fake” news

Come on now, Whonix is the Wikileaks of anonymous news.

For what it’s worth, no problems with Whonix news in Qubes-Whonix.

I wonder if it’s one of those temporary bad/malicious Tor circuits. Presumably if you use ARM to rotate circuits (hitting ‘n’ for new circuit) and try again, you’ll get a successful output.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix news cannot be verified
item.dc:creator: qguy
item.description:
Today the whonixcheck of both my workstation and gateway said it failed to verify whonix news.

Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News !!! 
(gpg_bash_lib_output_gpg_verify_exit_code: 0 | gpg_bash_lib_output_validsig_status: true | gpg_bash_lib_output_alright_status: false | gpg_bash_lib_output_failure: ) 
This is either, 
- a Whonix Bug, 
- an attack on Whonix, 
- or Whonix News Keys might be outdated. Upgrading using apt-get might fix this

p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }
